sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import '../components/css/post.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; const Space =()=>{ const {id}=useParams(); const [space, setSpace] = React.useState(null); const [posts,setPost] = React.useState([]); console.log(id); React.useEffect(() => { fetch("/getspace/"+id) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { setSpace(data.space) setPost(data.posts) }); }, []); console.log(space) return(
{!space ? "Loading..." :
{space.name}
{space.content}
}
{ posts.map((post)=>{ return(
34 Comments
{post.creator}

{post.question}

Explore post
); }) }
SHARE

Created On

December 31, 2020

Last Updated

December 31, 2020
Card title
Card subtitle

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.

Volunteer Get Support
54 Views
) } export default Space;
